name: Trimmer - Increase Aggressiveness
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "XU-11 Serum" "154909" #L "Chemical Impact Injector" "142911" #L "Trimmer Casing" "154938" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ XU-11 Serum + Chemical Impact Injector = #L "Modified Chemical Impact Injector" "154911" Skills: | CH | ------------------------------ Modified Chemical Impact Injector + Trimmer Casing = #L "Trimmer - Increase Aggressiveness" "154940" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ An extremely important item for Engineers. Select your bot and use this item. The effect should stay on your pet and make it more aggressive. A level 200 one of these works VERY well for engis when they are taking on 'real mean' and 'ace' mobs.
